Shixie.Xiangjun Shi Trofimov
    WORK CONTACT

Shoot the Budgie

// A physical prototyping exercise

Focusing on the contrast between the brutality associated with a gun and the delicate balancing act of a tiny, gentle bird, the experience of pulling the trigger provokes thought on violence through an intense juxtaposition of feelings.

Year 2014
Client Self
Role Designer, Animator
Mentors Phil van Allen

Assignment Brief: Not a Knob

The brief of the project encourages us to think outside the box for an unexpected way to use the knob (or a potentiometer). It occurred to me that since the knob given to us is limited in how much it can turn, it is essentially a trigger. I was excited about the engineering involved to make it bounce back, and quickly made the prototype out of laser cut masonite, spring, screws and some hot glue. The prototype worked surprisingly well.



If given more time I would love to build in a simple plastic piece to create the appropriate sound when the trigger is pulled. At the moment, while the physical response (the trigger springs back after being pulled) is successful, I do miss the audio confirmation for my action.

from Shixie. 2015
